{{also|Zimmer frame}} ==English== ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # {{clipping of|en|Zimmer frame}} ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== {{PIE root|de|dem}} From {{inh|de|gmh|zimber}}, from {{inh|de|goh|zimbar}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*timrą}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*dem-|t=build, house}} (see {{cog|ine-pro|*dṓm}}). Cognate with {{cog|nds-de|[[Simmer]] {{q|Münsterländisch}}}}, {{cog|en|timber}} and {{cog|nl|timmer|t=building; construction; room}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈt͡sɪmɐ/}} * {{a|Austria}} {{audio|de|De-at-Zimmer.ogg}} * {{audio|de|De-Zimmer.oga}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n||Zimmer}} # [[room]] {{gloss|separate part of a building, enclosed by walls, a floor and a ceiling}} #: {{syn|de|Raum}} #* '''1918''', [[w:de:Elisabeth von Heyking|Elisabeth von Heyking]], ''[[s:de:Die Orgelpfeifen|Die Orgelpfeifen]]'', in: Zwei Erzählungen, Phillipp Reclam jun. Verlag, page 19: #*: Die eigenen '''Zimmer''' hatten sich die Enkel nach persönlichem Geschmack eingerichtet. #*:: The grandchildren had furnished their own '''rooms''' according to their personal taste. ====Usage notes==== * {{m|de||Zimmer}} is used of the rooms in a private dwelling, excluding cellar and loft unless they are furnished and used as a part of the dwelling, and usually also excluding passages, kitchens, larders, toilets, utility rooms, and the like (though a private bathroom is called {{m|de|Badezimmer}}). * In collectively used dwellings such as hotels, shelters, or hospitals, {{m|de||Zimmer}} is used chiefly of those rooms that are private to a small number of people (1 to circa 10). In barracks, these are called {{m|de|Stube|Stuben}}, in prisons, {{m|de|Zelle|Zellen}}. * In the workplace, {{m|de||Zimmer}} is less common, but it may be used e.g. of personal offices or rooms where clients are received. * Otherwise, {{m|de|Raum}} is typically used. It is also the most general word which should be preferred in all cases of doubt. Using it for those rooms defined as {{m|de||Zimmer}} above is possible, but not always usual. ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|s}} ====Derived terms==== {{der4 |de|{{l|de|Esszimmer|g=n|t=dining room}} |{{l|de|Frauenzimmer|g=n|t=woman}} |{{l|de|Hinterzimmer|g=n|t=backroom}} |{{l|de|Wohnzimmer|g=n|t=living room}} |{{l|de|Zimmerservice|g=m|g2=n|t=room service}} |{{l|de|Gästezimmer|g=n|t=guest room}} |{{l|de|Arbeitszimmer|g=n|t=workroom}} |{{l|de|Schlafzimmer|g=n|t=bedroom}} |{{l|de|Badezimmer|g=n|t=bathroom}} |{{l|de|Zimmerpflanze|g=f|t=houseplant, indoor plant}} |{{l|de|Zimmertemperatur|g=f|t=room temperature}} |{{l|de|Klassenzimmer|g=n|t=classroom}} |{{l|de|Zimmernummer|g=f|t=room number}} |{{l|de|Zimmerschlüssel|g=m|t=room key}} }} ====See also==== * {{l|de|Stube}} * {{l|de|Kammer}} * {{l|de|Saal}} {{qualifier|for [[function]]s}} * {{l|de|Platz|t=[[place]]}} ===External links=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/ˈt͡simɐ/}} ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=n|plural|Zimmer}} # [[room]] ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary]
